content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Explre the data first
------------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT top 10
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data

    JOIN OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                    FIRSTROW = 2 ,
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
                    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
                )
                WITH (loation_id SMALLINT 1,
                borough VARCHAR(15)  2 ,
                zone VARCHAR(50)  3 ,
                service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4  
                )AS taxi_zone_data 
    ON trip_data.PULocationID = taxi_zone_data.loation_id 

    JOIN (
                SELECT payment_type ,  payment_type_desc
                    FROM OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'payment_type.json' ,
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw' ,
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b', -- Vertical Tab
                    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b' -- Vertical Tab
                    )WITH(  
                        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
                    ) AS payment_type
                    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc) 
                    WITH (
                            payment_type SMALLINT ,
                            payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15)
                    )

        ) AS payment_type_data ON trip_data.payment_type = payment_type_data.payment_type
        WHERE trip_data.payment_type IN ( 1,2)
    --GROUP BY taxi_zone_data.borough
    --ORDER BY  no_of_records ASC;

------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Normal Query
------------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT top 10
    taxi_zone_data.borough
    ,COUNT(1) AS total_trips
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS cash_trips
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS card_trips
    ,(SUM(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / (COUNT(1)*1.0 )) * 100  AS cash_trips_percentage
    ,(SUM(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / (COUNT(1)*1.0 )) * 100  AS card_trips_percentage
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2021/month=01/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data

    JOIN OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                    FIRSTROW = 2 ,
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
                    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
                )
                WITH (loation_id SMALLINT 1,
                borough VARCHAR(15)  2 ,
                zone VARCHAR(50)  3 ,
                service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4  
                )AS taxi_zone_data 
    ON trip_data.PULocationID = taxi_zone_data.loation_id 

    JOIN (
                SELECT payment_type ,  payment_type_desc
                    FROM OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'payment_type.json' ,
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw' ,
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b', -- Vertical Tab
                    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b' -- Vertical Tab
                    )WITH(  
                        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
                    ) AS payment_type
                    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc) 
                    WITH (
                            payment_type SMALLINT ,
                            payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15)
                    )

        ) AS payment_type_data ON trip_data.payment_type = payment_type_data.payment_type
        WHERE trip_data.payment_type IN ( 1,2)
    GROUP BY taxi_zone_data.borough
    --ORDER BY  no_of_records ASC;



------------------------------------------------------------------
-- using CTE
------------------------------------------------------------------    

;with trip_data AS
(
    SELECT * FROM
        OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2021/month=01/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data
),taxi_zone_data  AS
(
    SELECT * FROM
    OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                    FIRSTROW = 2 ,
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
                    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
                )
                WITH (loation_id SMALLINT 1,
                borough VARCHAR(15)  2 ,
                zone VARCHAR(50)  3 ,
                service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4  
                )AS taxi_zone_data 
),payment_type_data AS
(
    SELECT payment_type ,  payment_type_desc
                    FROM OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'payment_type.json' ,
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw' ,
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b', -- Vertical Tab
                    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b' -- Vertical Tab
                    )WITH(  
                        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
                    ) AS payment_type
                    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc) 
                    WITH (
                            payment_type SMALLINT ,
                            payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15)
                    )

)
SELECT top 10
    taxi_zone_data.borough
    ,COUNT(1) AS total_trips
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN payment_type_data.payment_type_desc = 'Credit card'  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS card_trips
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN payment_type_data.payment_type_desc = 'Cash'         THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cash_trips
    ,(SUM(CASE WHEN payment_type_data.payment_type_desc = 'Credit card' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / (COUNT(1)*1.0 )) * 100  AS card_trips_percentage
    ,(SUM(CASE WHEN payment_type_data.payment_type_desc = 'Cash'        THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / (COUNT(1)*1.0 )) * 100  AS cash_trips_percentage
FROM
    trip_data 
    LEFT JOIN taxi_zone_data ON trip_data.PULocationID = taxi_zone_data.loation_id 
    LEFT JOIN payment_type_data ON trip_data.payment_type = payment_type_data.payment_type
WHERE payment_type_data.payment_type_desc  IN ( 'Credit card','Cash')
GROUP BY taxi_zone_data.borough
